attributes.action: get more police officers around schools before and after school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need more police officers to be around all schools before and after school as there is a pedophile out there and she nearly got my child, if it wasnt for me being on the ball then my daughter would have been taken and there would b a missing person that the police r looking for and not a pedophile. WE REALLY NEED THE HELP TO PROTECT OUR CHILDREN please help
